introParagraph.text: You can launch a website in a few days using a constructor or build a complex platform from scratch.
introParagraph.textNext: What matters is not 'how', but why
introParagraph.textAnd: — the choice depends on business goals.

constructor.title: When to choose a constructor:
list: Need a quick MVP, promo, or landing launch
Simple needs: business card site or portfolio

development.title: When custom development is worth it:
list: Need full freedom in design, integrations, and architecture
Website should grow with the business
Priority is security, speed, and SEO
subList: This is a solution for those who are building not just a website, but a growth tool.
